name: Balanced Parenting
description:
Take care of the little egg...it might hatch!

Fixed version here!

A - D or left - right arrow key to rotate the nest

First game, taught myself unity during the quarantine. 

Even publishing something playable was a big win for me,thank you for playing.

theme was: KEEP IT ALIVE
(i wanted to add so many things but i really couldn't in two days,maybe next time i'll be faster!)

Art by my dear GF and her lovely sister: @jris_blue
(bug fixing by the great master engineering programmer my honeybunny GF)
